title: Warm Thai kale salad
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1/2 red onion, thinly sliced', '5 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon minced fresh ginger root', '2 teaspoons dried chilli flakes', '4 carrots, thinly sliced', '3 stalks celery, thinly sliced', '8 leaves kale, stemmed and torn into pieces', '5 sprigs fresh coriander, roughly chopped', '1 lime, juiced', '2 teaspoons fish sauce', '1/2 teaspoon lime zest, or to taste', '1 small cucumber, cut into matchstick-size pieces (optional)', '35g roasted peanuts (optional)', '4 sprigs fresh mint, roughly chopped']
